QuestData.Title: Rescue the Stonefather... and Flint
QuestData.Description: We found out where the Stonefather is being held and young Flint ran off on his own to rescue him!$B$BI don't have to tell you that this is bad. Flint is going to get himself captured as well, or worse!$B$BThe stone trogg chieftain, Bouldergut, is at the end of the ledges above Needlerock Chasm to the north.$B$BPlease, $n, you must go after Flint and free the Stonefather before we lose them both!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Slay the stone trogg chieftain to rescue the Stonefather... and Flint!
QuestData.CompletionText: You must rescue Stonefather Oremantle. There's no time to waste, $n!
QuestData.RewardText: $n! You did it! How will we ever repay you?
